movie.title: Blinded by the Light
movie.plot: In 1987, during the austere days of Thatcherâ€™s Britain, a teenager learns to live life, understand his family, and find his own voice through the music of Bruce Springsteen.

events.title: Javed Khan listens to Bruce Springsteen for the first time, and throws his poetry away
